entry.title: Uma-Kumarasamy/Gemini_AI_Clone: Gemini AI Clone 🔥 | React + Vite + Google Generative AI A lightweight AI chatbot built using React, Vite, and Google's Generative AI (Gemini API). This project allows users to input prompts and receive AI-generated responses in real-time.
entry.content: Gemini AI Clone 🔥 | React + Vite + Google Generative AI A lightweight AI chatbot built using React, Vite, and Google's Generative AI (Gemini API). This project allows users to input prompts and receive AI-generated responses in real-time.

entry.title: anishNagula/Quick-Search-A-Custom-Bang-Search-Engine: A simple and lightweight search tool with custom bang shortcuts (!bang) for quick redirections to various search engines and websites. Supports dropdown suggestions, arrow key navigation, and auto-search on selection.
entry.content: A simple and lightweight search tool with custom bang shortcuts (!bang) for quick redirections to various search engines and websites. Supports dropdown suggestions, arrow key navigation, and auto-search on selection.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
